description: Hotel Emisia Sapporo is a premier conference hotel located in the Atsubetsu district of Sapporo, Hokkaido, Japan. The venue provided excellent facilities for the inaugural EBISION symposium held in conjunction with MobiSec 2025.
transportation: Located near Shin-Sapporo Station on the JR Chitose Line and Sapporo Municipal Subway Tozai Line, providing convenient access from New Chitose Airport (approximately 30 minutes by JR rapid train).
